title: Remi Bader and Ocean's 1st Birthday
description:
It’s Ocean’s 1st birthday (okay, the day after), and Lala is feeling a bit emotional reflecting on what’s been the best year of her life, but also telling some great stories from Ocean’s star-studded birthday bash at Jax and Brittany’s house. And Remi Bader has taken TikTok and the fashion world by storm with her realistic try-on hauls, and her red-hot curvy looks! Remi shares how she got into fashion, modeling, and content creation, and became a brand ambassador for Victoria’s Secret PINK! She talks about her inspiration, dealing with haters, and how fun videos for herself and her friends turned into an epic if not surprising career path!
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
